params._nextAddress: The next address of the managed contract.

publish(bytes32,address).notice: Publishes the next version of the managed contract, `nextTag`, at `nextAddress`.

rollback().notice: Rolls back 'stable' to the previous deployment, and returns true, if one exists, returns false otherwise.

setStable(bytes32).notice: Sets the value of 'stable' to the address of `nextTag`.
